name: Hudex
additional_notices: No active trades are found for this coin. Please submit a ticket at %{link} if you think this is an error.

The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
HuDex is a powerful all-in-one cryptocurrency platform that provides info about all the decentralized markets. Assimilating blockchain data into one comprehensive UI, HuDex  helps to make informed investment decisions. Its simplicity, security, and useful features make it a valuable tool for investors and traders in the dynamic world of cryptocurrency.

HuDex features include:
- Dashboard: provides users with real-time analytics and insights on the performance metrics of the top-tier blockchains
- Pair Explorer: allows users to check the charts and transactions of a token in addition to trade the token while visualizing all of its associated metrics on the same page.
- HuSwap: allows users to trade any token, and our router will automatically and quickly find the cheapest way to execute your trade.
- Contract checker: allows users to verify and audit smart contracts for safety and security, ensuring that they are secure and free from vulnerabilities before interacting with them.
- HuBridge: Users will be able to seamlessly transfer assets between different blockchain networks with our bridge aggregator.

- Contract checker: allows users to verify and audit smart contracts for safety and security, ensuring that they are secure and free from vulnerabilities before interacting with them.
- HuBridge: Users will be able to seamlessly transfer assets between different blockchain networks with our bridge aggregator.
